definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.chinese: 更新基于映像部署的客户机。
基于分区或磁盘映像的部署。

sentences.english: Understanding the deployment environment currently in place with the other application server is valuable.
sentences.chinese: 理解另一个应用服务器的当前部署环境是有价值的。

sentences.english: Tests can then be deployed to the integrated test server and executed.
sentences.chinese: 然后可以将测试部署到集成测试服务器并执行。

sentences.english: Other components of the three-tier deployment also impact performance.
sentences.chinese: 三层部署中的其他部分也影响性能。

sentences.english: Log back on to the Admin Console for the deployment manager server.
sentences.chinese: 重新登录到部署管理器服务器的管理控制台。

sentences.english: Timely deployment of work safety, strict implementation of territorial regulatory responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 及时研究部署安全生产工作，严格落实属地监管责任。

sentences.english: The components provided in the library are grouped into features for deployment purposes.
sentences.chinese: 为便于部署，库中提供的组件被组合成特性。

sentences.english: Now I'd like to make a slight change and redeploy the application.
sentences.chinese: 现在我想略微进行一些更改，然后重新部署应用程序。

sentences.english: You can include additional files in your pre-deployment or post-deployment script.
sentences.chinese: 可在预先部署脚本或后期部署脚本中包含其他文件。

sentences.english: You can include additional files in your pre-deployment or post-deployment script.
sentences.chinese: 可在预先部署脚本或后期部署脚本中包含其他文件。

sentences.english: Deploy a bus service and a decompression filter for the Bus off-ramp.
sentences.chinese: 为总线出站部署一个总线服务和一个解压缩过滤器。

sentences.english: Some of the new features raise security concerns and may cause slower deployment.
sentences.chinese: 一些新的特性引起了安全隐患，并可能导致部署缓慢。

sentences.english: The move authorises funds and personnel to deal with the influx.
sentences.chinese: 政府还部署了资金和人力来应对人流的大量涌入。

sentences.english: The crew-served team is most vulnerable while emplacing the weapon or breaking it down.
sentences.chinese: 在部署及解除武器时重武器小组是最易受到打击的。

sentences.english: How to develop an organization structure of LSS in various deployment stages?
sentences.chinese: 在不同的部署阶段如何开发组织性结构？

definition: to call a conference/to convene a meeting
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
